states.Description:
You are in a dungeon. Glowing, purple mist fills the room with no apparent source. You smell blood, but see none.

The room is full of grim looking contraptions. A dead torturer sits slumped in an armchair. A pile of loose keys sits in a tray.

The only exit is up.
The tray of keys is in front of you. They are all inscribed with a number. What number would you like to search for?

commands.ReplyText: As soon as your fingers brush the keys, you pull your hand away. It is like touching a hot stove, though the keys are not hot: they might be enchanted to keep certain people from touching them.
